message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. I'm confident you'll find this a worthwhile investment.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $13,500. This is a fair compromise.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my initial offer. I am willing to pay $12,000 for the product.
